#summary Information about the GUI
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The GUI is written in Ruby. It uses GTK for the windows and thus requires it. The GUI has been tested in both Linux and Windows.

= Dependencies =

Your linux distro will most likely take care of your deps.

In Windows, you have to install [http://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/ Ruby] and [http://ruby-gnome2.sourceforge.jp/ ruby-gtk2] (filename: _ruby-gtk2-0.16.0-1-i386-msvcrt-1.8.zip_).
